rows.label: tev018801_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev018801_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Wolf about positioning during combat.

rows.label: tev018801_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev018801_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Wolf if anything is troubling him.

rows.label: tev018801_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Wolf how to overwhelm your foes.

rows.label: tev018801_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Wolf if anything is troubling him.

rows.label: tev018801_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Wolf how to use taunt Arts wisely.

rows.label: tev018801_SEL0061
rows.name: Ask Wolf if anything is troubling him.

rows.label: tev018801_SEL0071
rows.name: Ask Wolf how to further overwhelm your foes.

rows.label: tev018801_SEL0081
rows.name: Ask Wolf if anything is troubling him.

rows.label: tev018801_SEL0091
rows.name: Ask Wolf about the different Skell Overdrive systems.

rows.label: tev018801_SEL0101
rows.name: Ask Wolf if anything is troubling him.

rows.label: tev018801_SEL0111
rows.name: Ask Wolf what he thinks about you.

rows.label: tev018801_SEL0121
rows.name: Ask Wolf if anything is troubling him.

rows.label: tev018801_SEL0131
rows.name: Ask Wolf if anything is troubling him.

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0001
rows.name:
Any fool who's dumb enough to face his foe head-on
won't live to make the same mistake twice. You must
constantly move to stay in your opponent's blind spots![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0002
rows.name:
Attack your foe from the back! Attack it from on high
or below! Anywhere but head-on![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0003
rows.name:
Attacking from any of those positions will improve
your accuracy and your odds of landing a critical hit![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0004
rows.name:
Do you understand? Do you not understand?
Either way, repeat what I just said a thousand times
until it finally penetrates that thick skull of yours![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0009
rows.name:
I lovingly instruct BLADE rookies that don't even know
the basics of combat until they grow into respectable
BLADE operatives.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0010
rows.name:
But recently, a number of cowards have failed to
withstand my love and fled my training sessions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0011
rows.name: But you look like the type that can take it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0012
rows.name:
If you decide to join BLADE, you come and ask me
anything. I will take the fundamentals of combat and
beat them right into you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0017
rows.name:
If that's your goal, you want to topple them.
You'll never miss a toppled foe, and the effect is
obscenely powerful![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0018
rows.name:
But to set up a topple, you first gotta stagger your foe.
Now shut yer yap-hole and remember this![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0019
rows.name:
Once a foe has been staggered, if you then hit them
with an Art that has the topple effect, you'll always
topple them. Nice, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0020
rows.name:
But an even more powerful way to control your foes
is with a Skell's bind maneuver.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0021
rows.name:
They may actually let you pilot a Skell one day,
so in anticipation of that, remember my words.
...And it could be a while, so write it down![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0022
rows.name:
Follow a stagger with a topple!
And if you're in a Skell, it's stagger into bind![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0023
rows.name:
When you get used to using your secondary cooldown
strategically, you'll be able to challenge stronger foes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0024
rows.name:
Rookies panic and use all their Arts as soon as they
are ready to be cast. This is a serious matter of
concern for me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0025
rows.name:
You see, some Arts are more effective the longer you
hold out. Watch their cooldown gauges carefully to see
what I mean.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0026
rows.name:
You're the one responsible for setting your own Arts,
so you should strive to know all their effects both at
their primary and secondary cooldown gauge levels.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0031
rows.name:
Taunts are a way to attract an enemy's attention in
order to protect your comrades.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0032
rows.name:
They are NOT Arts for wannabe heroes to use when
they're at the brink of death![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0033
rows.name:
It is better to use them early in the battle when you
aren't under intense pressure.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0034
rows.name: A taunted foe enters the flinch state.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0035
rows.name:
Do it right when your foe is about to use a powerful
attack, because a flinch can head off such a move.
Remember that![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0038
rows.name:
When you set your skills, their effects occur innately.
You don't have to trigger them like you do with Arts.
Why is that so hard for you idiots to understand?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0039
rows.name: Hmph. And what about you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0040
rows.name:
Have you set your skills?
Are you strengthening your skills?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0041
rows.name:
If you neglect either, combat will go badly for you!
Beat that into your fool heads and don't embarrass me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0046
rows.name:
Hmm... Well, I'm sure you're beyond basic stagger-
and-topple tactics at this point.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0047
rows.name:
Do you remember about using bind? ...Well?! Do you?!
I sure remember telling you about it, and in a loud
enough voice that I damn well know you heard me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0048
rows.name:
When you're piloting a Skell and you stagger your
enemy, immediately use bind! Immediately![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0049
rows.name:
Then your foe will be completely immobilized
and you can torment it to your heart's content![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0051
rows.name:
What? You're going to embarrass me by claiming
Overdrive chains are too hard to understand?
They couldn't be easier![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0052
rows.name:
If you want to dish out big damage,
chain attack-type colors![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0053
rows.name:
If you want to maintain Overdrive for longer,
chain support-type colors![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0054
rows.name:
Which are the attack-type colors? Orange is melee!
Yellow is ranged! Purple is debuff![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0055
rows.name:
Which are the support-type colors?
Green is buffs and blue is auras!
...Intuitive, right? So remember it intuitively![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0059
rows.name:
I think it's time you learned about the differences
between Skell model capabilities.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0060
rows.name: The installed Overdrive system varies by Skell.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0061
rows.name:
The Nagi greatly reduces damage received,
while the Hagane strengthens your melee attacks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0062
rows.name:
If you're new at this, you can always pick your Skell
based on its Overdrive system.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0063
rows.name:
But no matter how strong a Skell is, it don't mean
diddly-crap unless the pilot has good judgment.
So tread carefully![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0065
rows.name:
A lot of idiots get too used to fighting mock Skell
battles and forget to watch their fuel consumption.
And that's why I have migraines![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0066
rows.name:
When you're training at the Outfitters test hangar,
you can get resupplied as soon as you run out of gas.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0067
rows.name:
But who do you think's gonna come give you a fill-up
when you run out of gas outside of New LA and end
up surrounded by dangerous enemies? Your MAMA?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0068
rows.name:
You can't very well pilot your Skell when you are out
of fuel, can you? So you're gonna be in for a tough
fight unless you manage your fuel consumption![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0069
rows.name:
A smart fighter uses weapons that consume large
amounts of fuel during Overdrive, when fuel costs are
reduced to zero. So get that through your thick head![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0071
rows.name:
You wanna know what I think about you, do you,
[ST:playername ]?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0072
rows.name:
...Well, I can't even count the number of BLADEs I've
trained, but I've never enjoyed watching one grow as
much as you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0073
rows.name:
How's that amnesia of yours doing, anyway?
...Still can't remember anything, huh? Damn shame.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0074
rows.name:
As strong a fighter as you are, I figure I would
remember you from back on the White Whale.
Hmm...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0075
rows.name:
Well, there's nothing special about your amnesia here.
Everybody gets to have a new life here on Mira![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0080
rows.name:
So what do you think of this face of mine, mmm?
Manly? Gentle?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0081
rows.name:
Give it to me straight. I don't want you pulling any
punches. What about the scar? Rugged? Scary?
You wanna know what mighty enemy gave me this?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0082
rows.name:
This face is what got me the job as instructor.
This face is what earns me the fear of my students.
I can tell you this because I know Nagi trusts you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0083
rows.name:
So this scar? I got it when I was 17 years old.
Took a bad spill when I was hot-dogging on my
damn snowboard.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0084
rows.name:
If I'd stayed slim and handsome like some teen movie
star, where do you think I'd be now, huh?
How different do you think my life would be?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0091
rows.name:
This face is what got me the job as instructor.
This face is what earns me the fear of my students.
I can tell you this because I know Nagi trusts you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0092
rows.name:
How different do you think my life would be today if
I was slim and handsome, huh? Sometimes I get to
thinking about that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0093
rows.name:
And when I do, I can hear the devil whispering in
my ear. Straight from the hell that's deep below the
lower level of this here administrative district![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0094
rows.name:
He whispers that I should be who I want to be,
even if it's only for the short time until we return
to our old bodies from the Lifehold Core.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0095
rows.name: And that whispering devil's name...is Yardley.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018801_MSG0096
rows.name:
But I'm the man who teaches young BLADEs!
Even though I probably never would have gotten this
job if it wasn't for my face...[ST:wait ]
